Title: 6.5.10 Mitigate Broken Authentication and Session Management

Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 6.5.10

==Policy Statement==

Mitigate broken authentication and session management vulnerabilities.

==Policy Purpose==

Common vulnerability types should be mitigated to prevent successful attacks that exploit these vulnerability types.
